translation.en: -Nice meeting you. -[Human #95] Nice meeting you.
translation.it: - Un piacere conoscerti. - Piacere mio.

translation.en: [Zainab] And here are the results.

translation.en: Women found a man in uniform to be less attractive than a man in street clothes.

translation.en: So I guess the fact that my dad left my mom for the milkman

translation.en: Thus proving our theory that men are attracted to anything

translation.en: So overall, there was no jump in attraction

translation.en: To which I say, "Duh!"

translation.en: Okay, so being rich has its advantages when it comes to the power of attraction,

translation.en: A lot of people believe that if you go on trial for something

translation.en: and you're good-looking, the jury will give you a lighter sentence

translation.en: [Sammy] In our next experiment, we ask

translation.en: To begin, we've divided up our humans into two groups of fifty.

translation.en: Group A will see one set of mugshots

translation.en: if the criminal isn't too bad on the eyes.

translation.en: Hello, humans.

translation.en: [all] Hello.
translation.it: Salve.

translation.en: Now, these were all people who were found guilty of their crimes

translation.en: Okay?
translation.it: Ok?

translation.en: You keeping up over there?

translation.en: is between three years to ten years.

translation.en: So give it a second and think about what length of sentence you would give him.

translation.en: [Sammy] So what was the average sentence for the less attractive Dan?

translation.en: I mean, packages on the front of doorsteps

translation.en: [Sammy] Okay, manslaughter is a serious crime.

translation.en: Is this guilty criminal's attractiveness

translation.en: I think that you should know better.

translation.en: To find out why our humans gave good-looking criminals such lenient sentences,

translation.en: I sat down with Professor of Law, Jody Armour.

translation.en: Your unconscious bias

translation.en: can make you morally judge somebody more harshly
translation.it: Il pregiudizio inconscio può farti giudicare qualcuno più duramente

translation.en: because they come from a stereotyped group.

translation.en: The darker-skinned you are, the more deathworthy you're deemed.

translation.en: -with the seasons. -Yes.

translation.en: Hey, but here's the answer to that question.

translation.en: because then the lighter you will be there for the jury to look at.

translation.en: So speaking of lighter-skinness,

translation.en: are you saying that kind of Western traditional attractiveness,

translation.it: La scoperta è che

translation.en: that's much harsher for the unattractive than the attractive one.

translation.en: That's like flipping a coin and saying if you're attractive, you're less wicked.

translation.it: rispetto a qualcuno che non ha la stessa simmetria

translation.en: and doesn't have the same features."

translation.en: That's just the truth.

translation.en: Just as I have to recognize my male privilege,
translation.it: Io riconosco il privilegio di essere maschio,

translation.en: you have to recognize your attractiveness privilege.
translation.it: e tu devi riconoscere il privilegio della bellezza.

translation.en: That's what it is. It's attractive privilege.

translation.en: -It is. -People treat you differently

translation.en: And it's not your fault, you screaming hot hottie. It's ours.

translation.en: Your attractiveness means you are nice. It means you are smart.

translation.it: Certo, voi irresistibili avete le stesse probabilità degli altri

translation.en: where we ask does being funny make you sexier?

translation.en: To begin our experiment, we've divided our humans into two audiences

translation.en: and enlisted the help of two struggling stand-up comics.

translation.en: -[all] Yes. -[man] Yeah.
translation.it: - Sì! - Certo.

translation.en: This experiment is going to test verbal presentation skills.

translation.en: You'll hear from two speakers and then you'll rate their performances.
translation.it: Ascolterete due oratori e valuterete la loro performance.

translation.en: [Alie] To create a baseline,
translation.it: Per creare una base comune,

translation.en: Andy and Dina are going to tell each group a very boring story.
translation.it: Andy e Dina racconteranno a ogni gruppo una storia noiosissima.
